page.title: 07The Clothes I Wear.
page.content: {School}In winter I wear thermal vests and cotton underpants and nylon and cotton socks.I wear jeans and sometimes trousers. My jumpers are made out of cotton and acrylic.I wear a cotton coat with a woollen scarf. In summer I wear shorts, a nylon tee-shirt, trainers(suede and nylon), nylon underpants and no coat. {Discos}I wear cotton underpants and cotton socks. A very warm jumper with green stripes. I wear blue nylon trousers with a blue belt, and I wear black shoes. {Hobbies}For BMX I wear a bright yellow and blue jumper and padded trousers (yellow and blue). My other hobby is stamp collecting. For that I wear normal everyday clothes. By Owen Dawson, age 10.
